text: The Rejection and the Meaning of the World, known also as World Rejection and Theodicy (), is a 1916 essay written by Max Weber, a German economist and sociologist. The original edition was published in German as an essay in the 1916 issues of the Archiv f√ºr Sozialwissenschaft und Sozialforschung, and various translations to English exist.
